languages.text: "Он есть великое чудо, дыхание Омниссии, призванное помочь нам прервать цикл. Он родился из сокровищ, что Амарнат и Теодора обнаружили в темных мирах. Но даже такому великому созданию нужны помощники и проводники. И пока схизма терзает флот "Осознание", и мои собратья терпят поражение за поражением — некому помогать духу. Вот почему я явился сюда".

"It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long as the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers and sisters suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."
languages.original_text: "Он есть великое чудо, дыхание Омниссии, призванное помочь нам прервать цикл. Он родился из сокровищ, что Амарнат и Теодора обнаружили в темных мирах. Но даже такому великому созданию нужны помощники и проводники. И пока схизма терзает флот "Осознание", и мои собратья терпят поражение за поражением — некому помогать духу. Вот почему я явился сюда".

traits.locale_text: "It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「偉大なる奇跡だ。万機神の息はサイクルを断ち切るのに役立つはずだ。それはアマルナトとシオドーラが闇の惑星で発見した宝からもたらされた。とはいえこれほど素晴らしいものでも従者やガイドが必要だ。コグニサンス艦隊が派閥分裂に悩み兄弟・姉妹が際限なき敗北に苦しんでいる限り、その精霊を守る者はいない。だから私がここに来た」
languages.original_text: "It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long as the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers and sisters suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."

traits.locale_text: 「偉大なる奇跡だ。万機神の息はサイクルを断ち切るのに役立つはずだ。それはアマルナトとシオドーラが闇の惑星で発見した宝からもたらされた。とはいえこれほど素晴らしいものでも従者やガイドが必要だ。コグニサンス艦隊が派閥分裂に悩み兄弟・姉妹が際限なき敗北に苦しんでいる限り、その精霊を守る者はいない。だから私がここに来た」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “那是个伟大的奇迹，是欧姆尼塞亚的呼吸，旨在协助我们终止循环。它诞生于阿玛纳特与西奥多拉在黑暗世界发现的宝藏。然而，即便是如此辉煌的意识，也需要侍从与向导。然而，只要真理开拓者舰队仍处于分裂状态，我的兄弟姐妹们就会不断遭受失败，也根本没有人能帮助这个伟大的机魂。正因如此，我才来到了这里。”
languages.original_text: "It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long as the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers and sisters suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."

traits.locale_text: “那是个伟大的奇迹，是欧姆尼塞亚的呼吸，旨在协助我们终止循环。它诞生于阿玛纳特与西奥多拉在黑暗世界发现的宝藏。然而，即便是如此辉煌的意识，也需要侍从与向导。然而，只要真理开拓者舰队仍处于分裂状态，我的兄弟们就会不断遭受失败，也根本没有人能帮助这个伟大的机魂。正因如此，我才来到了这里。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Es ist ein großes Wunder, der Odem des Omnissiah, der uns helfen soll, den Zyklus zu durchbrechen. Entstanden aus dem Schatz, den Amarnat und Theodora auf den dunklen Welten entdeckt haben. Doch selbst ein so glorreiches Wesen benötigt Diener und Führer. Und so lange die Erkenntnisflotte unter einer Spaltung leidet und meine Brüder und Schwestern endlose Niederlagen einstecken müssen, so lange kann dem Geist niemand helfen. Darum bin ich hergekommen."
languages.original_text: "It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long as the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers and sisters suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein großes Wunder, der Odem des Omnissiah, der uns helfen soll, den Zyklus zu durchbrechen. Entstanden aus dem Schatz, den Amarnat und Theodora auf den dunklen Welten entdeckt haben. Doch selbst ein so glorreiches Wesen benötigt Diener und Führer. Und so lange die Erkenntnisflotte unter einer Spaltung leidet und mein Bruder endlose Niederlagen einstecken muss, so lange kann dem Geist niemand helfen. Darum bin ich hergekommen."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Il est le fruit d'un grand miracle, le souffle de l'Omnimessie destiné à nous aider à interrompre le cycle. Il est né du trésor qu'Amarnat et Théodora ont découvert dans les mondes obscurs. Pourtant, même un être aussi glorieux a besoin d'être accompagné et guidé. Tant que la Flotte de la Connaissance sera en proie au schisme et que mes frères et sœurs subiront des défaites à répétition, il n'y aura personne pour lui venir en aide. C'est pourquoi je suis venu ici. »
languages.original_text: "It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long as the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers and sisters suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."

traits.locale_text: « Il est le fruit d'un grand miracle, le souffle de l'Omnimessie destiné à nous aider à interrompre le cycle. Il est né du trésor qu'Amarnat et Théodora ont découvert dans les mondes obscurs. Pourtant, même un être aussi glorieux a besoin d'être accompagné et guidé. Tant que la Flotte de la Connaissance sera en proie au schisme et que mes frères subiront des défaites à répétition, il n'y aura personne pour lui venir en aide. C'est pourquoi je suis venu ici. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Que es un gran milagro, el hálito que el Omnissiah ha exhalado para ayudarnos a interrumpir el Ciclo. Nació del tesoro que Amarnat y Theodora hallaron en los mundos tenebrosos. Pero incluso un ser tan glorioso necesita asistentes y guías. Y mientras exista un cisma en la Flota Conciencia y mis hermanos y hermanas sufran una derrota tras otra, no habrá nadie que ayude al espíritu. Por eso he venido».
languages.original_text: "It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long as the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers and sisters suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."

traits.locale_text: «Que es un gran milagro, el hálito que el Omnissiah ha exhalado para ayudarnos a interrumpir el Ciclo. Nació del tesoro que Amarnat y Theodora hallaron en los mundos tenebrosos. Pero incluso un ser tan glorioso necesita asistentes y guías. Y mientras exista un cisma en la Flota Conciencia y mis hermanos sufran una derrota tras otra, no habrá nadie que ayude al espíritu. Por eso he venido».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Büyük bir mucize olduğunu. Hermesih'in nefesi, Döngü'nün süreğini bozmamıza yardım edecekti. Amarnat ve Theodora'nın karanlık dünyalarda keşfettiği hazineden doğmuştu. Bu denli görkemli bir varlığın bile bakıcılara ve kılavuzlara ihtiyacı vardı. Ancak Malumat Filosu bölünmeden muzdaripken, kardeşlerimin yenilgilerinin ardı arkası kesilmiyorken kimse ruha yardım edemez. Buraya gelme sebebim de budur."
languages.original_text: "It is a great miracle, the Omnissiah's breath meant to help us discontinue the Cycle. It was born of the treasure that Amarnat and Theodora discovered upon the dark worlds. Yet even a being so glorious needs attendants and guides. And as long as the Cognisance Fleet is racked by schism and my brothers and sisters suffer defeats without end, there is no one to aid the spirit. That is why I came here."

traits.locale_text: "Büyük bir mucize olduğunu. Hermesih'in nefesi, Döngü'nün süreğini bozmamız için bize yardım edecekti. Amarnat ve Theodora'nın karanlık dünyalarda keşfettiği hazineden doğmuştu. Bu denli görkemli bir varlığın bile bakıcılara ve kılavuzlara ihtiyacı vardı. Ancak Malumat Filosu bölünmeden mustaripken ve kardeşlerimin yenilgilerinin ardı arkası kesilmiyorken kimse ruha yardım edemez. Buraya gelme sebebim de bu."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
